biography_text: LEVIN, Mike, a Representative from California; born on October 28, 1978; graduated from Loyola High School, Los Angeles, Calif., 1997; B.A., Stanford University, Stanford, Calif., 2001; J.D., Duke University, Raleigh, N.C., 2005; lawyer, private practice; business executive; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
